item.title: Blender Chess Piece Assignment
item.description: 10 Points For this assignment you will choose a chess piece to model in Blender. I expect you to use standard mesh modeling techniques and incorporate some sort of modifier.

item.title: DGM 2210 3D Modeling
item.description: DGM 2210 - 3D for 2D Pipelines The aim of this course is to teach the fundamentals of CG by using Blender as the vehicle to learn.
